about_the_game:
Football: The Beautiful Game

"If you're going to try, go all the way. Otherwise, don't even start."

--- Charles Bukowski

Your dream job, at Ocean City Football Club, awaits.

You are a freshly graduated sports scientist who has landed a dream job at an elite women's football team. You are suddenly thrust into the bustling, glamorous, and competitive world that is Ocean City.

As the story unfolds, you will form alliances, unknowingly create enemies, and learn valuable lessons about ambition, loyalty, and ultimately about yourself and what you are prepared to do to succeed.

This game is a strongly story-based Adult Visual Novel set in the unusual and fascinating world of women's professional football (soccer).

Through your choices in the game, you will have the chance to act as a catalyst for your club reclaiming its past glories, and stand proudly with those you love. You can also choose another path, one that not only exposes you to the dark underbelly of professional sport, but one that tempts you in.

Football, as with life, is a game of inches. A couple of inches too far to the left or too far to the right, and you lose. Every inch matters.

content_descriptors.notes: The Beautiful Game is an adult, erotic, Visual Novel. It contains adult language, alcohol usage, nudity, sexual themes, sexual situations, and graphic sexual content.
